error_msg: The parameters for Ridge regression must be one or more of ['alpha', 'fit_intercept', 'normalize', 'copy_X', 'max_iter', 'tol', 'solver', 'random_state'].
description: Ridge regression is a linear model that includes L2 regularization, which can help mitigate issues of multicollinearity in linear regression.

oneOf.error_msg: The 'alpha' parameter must be a positive number.
oneOf.description: The 'alpha' parameter specifies the regularization strength. It must be a positive number.

oneOf.error_msg: The 'fit_intercept' parameter must be of type boolean.
oneOf.description: The 'fit_intercept' parameter determines whether to calculate the intercept for this model. It must be of type boolean.

oneOf.error_msg: The 'copy_X' parameter must be of type boolean.
oneOf.description: The 'copy_X' parameter determines whether to copy the input variables. It must be of type boolean.

oneOf.error_msg: The 'max_iter' parameter must be a positive integer, or -1 to indicate that there is no iteration limit.
oneOf.description: The 'max_iter' parameter determines the maximum number of iterations for the solver. It must be a positive integer or -1 to indicate no limit.

oneOf.error_msg: The 'tol' parameter must be a positive number.
oneOf.description: The 'tol' parameter determines the tolerance for the optimization. It must be a positive number.

oneOf.error_msg: The 'solver' parameter must be one of 'auto', 'svd', 'cholesky', 'lsqr', 'sparse_cg', 'sag', 'saga', or 'lbfgs'.
oneOf.description: The 'solver' parameter determines the solver to use in the computational routines. It must be one of 'auto', 'svd', 'cholesky', 'lsqr', 'sparse_cg', 'sag', 'saga', or 'lbfgs'.

oneOf.error_msg: The 'random_state' parameter must be an integer greater than or equal to 0, or null.
oneOf.description: The 'random_state' parameter determines the seed used by the random number generator. It must be an integer greater than or equal to 0, or null.
